amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to mandate that no less than $225,000,000 may be appropriated for VA mental health and suicide prevention programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McSally amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A056) offered by Ms. McSally.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McSally amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.
